The Leonard E Parker

Center for Gravitation, Cosmology & Astrophysics

at the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee

ADS API Examples

A collection of tools that show you how to leverage the API of the ADS.

Documentation on the API can be found at the adsabs repo.

Using Andy Casey’s Python client

Get Andy Casey’s Client.

Examples:

  • Create metrics plots
  • Create search facet plots
  • Turn Article into Pandas object

Using Python Requests library

Get Kenneth Reitz’s Python Requests.

Examples:

  • Create search facet plots (optimised version)
  • Output your private library to a CSV file
